dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4105 IH: To amend title XX of the Social Security Act to extend the health professions workforce demonstration project.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Lawrence (for herself, Mr. Clyburn, Mr. Serrano, Mr. Tonko, Mr. Larsen of Washington, Mr. Rush, Mr. Grijalva, Mr. Espaillat, and Mr. Conyers) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend title XX of the Social Security Act to extend the health professions workforce demonstration project.

section.header: Extension of the health professions workforce demonstration project
section.text: Section 2008(c)(1) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1397g(c)(1)) is amended by striking 2017 and inserting 2022.
